<title level="1" right="Trait">[Comfort](/Traits.aspx?ID=203)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 275 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

The armor is so comfortable that you can rest normally while wearing it.
name: Comfort
